outcome_details: The plaintiffs were successful in obtaining judgment on the single debt issue and were awarded costs on a substantial indemnity basis against personal defendants Bill and Shirley Phair. The personal defendants are liable for the entire cost of the action, including on behalf of the corporate defendants.
summary: The court granted summary judgment against personal defendants Bill and Shirley Phair while dismissing the motion against corporate defendants. The plaintiffs were awarded costs on a substantial indemnity basis, amounting to $30,370.49, with personal defendants liable for this cost. The ruling highlighted the plaintiffs' success in obtaining judgment on the singular debt in issue, despite mixed success in the motion.
